susceptible_to: Necrotic ring-spot virus, downey mildew, verticillium wilt and insects
storability: Retains 52%-58% alpha acid after 6 months storage at 20ºC (68ºF)
style_guide: Lager, Pilsner, Bock, Wheat Beer, Kölsch, Munich Helles, Belgian Ale, American Lager
substitutes: Mount Hood, Liberty, Crystal, Hallertauer Mittelfrüh, Hallertauer Tradition, Ultra
name: Hallertau (US)
